conbody.p: An assignment workspace windo will apear on the screen after start of the Remote Assignments module (see ) on a student computer.

row.entry: Window control and help buttons area

conbody.p: Window control area 5 contain the standard Minimize/Restore, Maximize, and close buttons, plus a button that displays About dialog box (see ), from where an online copy of this manual can be consulted.
The assignment list 2 sown all assignments handed out to the student. List content can be controlled by applying filters 4. Selected assignment is displayed in the assignment panel 5.

Press Refresh list button to obtain update the list of assignments. Pressing this button will prompt you to save your work, after which assignments will be updated from the cloud (see ), including new assignments (if any), current assignent(s) status changes, grades, teacher comments, etc.
Assignment filter allows for a certain level of control over contents of the assignment list.
